caption: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM)
description: The SCIM Configuration object provides a structured set of attributes related to System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) protocols used for identity provisioning and management across cloud-based platforms. It standardizes user and group provisioning details, enabling identity synchronization and lifecycle management with compatible Identity Providers (IdPs) and applications.
name: scim

auth_protocol.description: The authorization protocol as defined by the caption of auth_protocol_id. In the case of Other, it is defined by the event source.

auth_protocol_id.description: The normalized identifier of the authorization protocol used by the SCIM Configuration.

protocol_name.caption: Supported Protocol
protocol_name.description: The supported protocol for the SCIM Configuration. E.g., SAML, OIDC, or OAuth2.

vendor_name.caption: Service Provider
vendor_name.description: Name of the vendor or service provider implementing SCIM. E.g., Okta, Auth0, Microsoft.

url_string.caption: SCIM Endpoint URL
url_string.description: The primary URL for SCIM API requests.
